channel.title: Ar on Dmytro's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ar on Dmytro's Blog

item.title: iOS AR App: Experience 3D Guitar
item.description: Introduction I was searching for an AR implementation of a 3D guitar inside an iOS app. Here’s what I discovered: First Step The first step is not related to building the app. Before that you need to create a project using the Reality Composer Pro app (you can find it through Spotlight search). Second Step After that, you need to visit https://developer.apple.com/augmented-reality/quick-look/ and download one of the USDZ files. In my case, I chose the 3D guitar.
